attributes.action: Demonstrate that politicians "serve the public interest and not their own" by the creation of a public sector wide expenses structure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We note that necessary expenses should be paid to enable all of those people serving the public to effectively do their work, this is not an issue.

The public trust cannot be restored in a system which maintains it has to remain above the rules of all others serving the public good.
The creation of a transparent and fair system applicable to all that serve the public is required.
